World's Largest Ball of Twine

Cawker City, Kansas Cawker City, Kansas

One of several contenders for the title, this massive ball of sisal twine is constantly growing.

About Kansas Attractions

Welcome to our collection of roadside attractions in Kansas. These unique destinations showcase the quirky and fascinating sites that make Kansas road trips so memorable.

Use the interactive map above to explore these attractions by location. You can filter by category to find specific types of attractions. Click on a map marker or list item to learn more about each fascinating location.
